urls.title: LATE SUMMER SALE
urls.description: Great prices for flights up until December!

data.text:
Want summer to last longer? 🌞 Book flight tickets! ✈️ In South Europe summer weather stays until late October, so enjoy it for two more months! Book your autumn flights for very special prices: https://t.co/5kob42PP2V

Book 🎫 16.08 - 25.08.2022
Travel ✈️ 01.09 - 16.12.2022 https://t.co/IVLESIdsJG

@RihardsOlups Labdien! Vai varam lūgt pārlūkprogrammu un operētājsistēmu, ko izmantojiet (info var arī DM ziņā)? Sākot ievadīt paroli, būtu "jāparādās" šādam logam labajā malā: https://t.co/AAno1jOUti
@arturoisdilf It was our pleasure, Marie! 💚

data.text:
@rickeard @Aspirelounge @manairport Hello! We forwarded your tweet to our team and were advised that unfortunately this has been an error from the lounge staff's side as there have not been any changes in our agreement.
We apologize for this inconvenience and will make sure with MAN such situations do not happen.
@Agy_1988 Nē, šī summa nav par kilogramu, bet par somu. Varēsiet to pārvadāt svarā līdz pat 32 kg.
@Agy_1988 Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par Jūsu rezervāciju - noteikti atradīsim labāko risinājumu!

@Agy_1988 Labrīt!
Jā - papildus somu ir iespējams pievienot gan izmantojot sadaļu “Mana Rezervācija”, gan tiešsaistes reģistrācijas laikā.

data.text: @A_Airzy @Gatwick_Airport @TLLairport Hello! We’re very sorry to hear about this unpleasant situation. Please fill out this claim, so that our colleagues can investigate this: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text: @geckofitness @Gatwick_Airport Hello! We’re very sorry to hear about this unpleasant situation, please accept our apologies. We kindly ask you to submit this claim, so that our colleagues can properly look into this: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An
@sidliddell Glad you enjoyed the flight, hopefully see you onboard with us in the future as well! 💚
@chrisjbrogan Hello! The delay is due to operational reasons - aircraft arriving late from its previous destination.

urls.title: airBaltic NFTs City Collection, Edition 14, Rīga - airBaltic blog
urls.description: Riga has always moved in step with the culture, fashion, and architecture of major European metropolises; it combines a modern Baltic lifestyle with history.

data.text: 🔔Next airBaltic #NFT City Collection is launching on Tuesday, August 16 at 13:00 UTC. It features Riga city and it is the last collection before the @PlaniesNFT launch. It will hold 100 NFTs and will be available for purchase for 0.1 Ether: https://t.co/SZIIHOFBGr https://t.co/a4heyFqrMq

data.text: @rosme331 DM ziņa ir privātā ziņa šeit Twitter! Mēģiniet spiest uz šīs pogas: https://t.co/i07wq7JWRh
@rosme331 Labdien! Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt konkrēto kupona kodu, kā arī ekrānšāviņu no aplikācijas ar tā derīguma termiņu - pārbaudīsim!

@sweettt_berrrry Labdien! Atvainojamies par šādu situāciju. Diemžēl nevarēsim to sīkāk komentēt, taču nodosim to mūsu kolēģiem izskatīšanai. Priecājamies, ka lidmašīnā atstātie dokumenti beigās atrasti.

urls.title: Change your flight | airBaltic
urls.description: For peace of mind, it's best to be completely prepared before your flight. However, if you have been a little bit careless, there are additional options available.

data.text:
@MaQPhoto Hi! Sorry to hear about such situation, we wish speedy recovery to him.
Yes, date/time change is available for all our tickets. More details: https://t.co/IVC41C11pP

@dj_beatmaster Attiecībā uz uzvarētāju, informējam, ka tas tiks izlozēts starp visiem lietotājiem, kas ielogojušies savā profilā un atjaunojuši informāciju. Loterijas atļauja šādos gadījumos nav nepieciešama, jo netiek veikts nekāds pirkums.

urls.title: airBaltic Club programmas noteikumi | airBaltic
urls.description: Šie noteikumi un nosacījumi ir attiecināmi uz visām akciju sabiedrības “Air Baltic Corporation” tīmekļa vietnēm, jo īpaši airBaltic.com

data.text: @dj_beatmaster Labdien! Balstoties uz airBaltic Club programmas noteikumiem (https://t.co/tnhBwB03OS), mums ir tiesības slēgt lietotāja kontu, ja tajā norādīti neprecīzi dati, tāpēc, ar šī e-pasta palīdzību lūdzam lietotājus pārliecināties par informācijas aktualitāti.

@Charon999999999 @TomGorse Please note that operating carrier rules apply for cabin baggage (despite what is written on the boarding pass issued to you by other airline) and for Economy class passengers on airBaltic flights the standard weight is 8 kg (main item 55x40x23 cm + personal item).
@Charon999999999 @TomGorse Hello! Standard weight of cabin baggage on airBaltic flights is 8 kg.

@simona_ka Good morning! Our apologies for this unpleasant situation.
May we kindly ask you to send us privately in DM more information such as your baggage irregularity reference number and flight details.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text:
@theduffman76 Hello! Apologies for this and inconveniences caused. Please submit us a claim in this case via the online form: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An
Our team will get back to you.

@gothtrotter The solutions are individual and clearly depend on the availability that day, therefore we won't be able to advise now on what these options would be. However this would be done on our expense, correct.
@theotherpiotr Hello, Piotr. Unfortunately not in cabin baggage - this most probably will be declared as a liquid, therefore cannot surpass 100ml as according to EU safety rules.

@gothtrotter Hello! If both flights are in the same itinerary (as connected flights) and you would miss your next connection due to our fault, our team would provide you with care as well as rebooking options.

urls.description: 899 Followers, 634 Following, 353 Posts - See Instagram photos and videos from by Robert Biraus (@latvia.aviation)

data.text:
Did you know it's #WingTipWednesday? Comment below your best wingtip pictures 💚

📸 https://t.co/o9HAULLoJ8 https://t.co/IuZRZg1K0g

@JamesAlexandrou Hello, James! Thanks for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear of such unpleasant situation. May we kindly ask you to share your delayed baggage file reference number by writing us a direct message? We will check. Thank you.

@Maaris_K Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Informējam, ka vieta var tikt mainīta operatīvu vai drošības apsvērumu dēļ kā to paredz mūsu Pasažieru un bagāžas pārvadāšanas noteikumu 12.1. punkts. Pateicamies par sapratni un atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām.

urls.title: airBaltic doubles passenger numbers in July
urls.description: During July 2022, Latvian airline airBaltic has carried 414 500 passengers or by 98% more than during the same period last year.

data.text: During one of the busiest months of the year, July, we carried 414 500 passengers in around 3 670 flights, that's 98% more than during the same period last year: https://t.co/JcZvzO6eis https://t.co/D15CuxbyyS
@peliite81 Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu jautājumu. Informējam, ka mūsu reģistrācijas galdiņi tiek atvērti divas stundas pirms plānotā izlidošanas laika. Paldies.
@dwayne_trip Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. May we kindly ask you to clarify your question? Thank you.

@ieva_sture Labdien! Nekādus traucējumus ar biļešu iegādes sistēmu neesam novērojuši, tāpēc, pieļaujam, ka šis ir atsevišķs gadījums. Lūdzam DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas par lidojumiem, kā arī ekrānšāviņu ar kļūdas paziņojumu.
@SoyEvaBarbosa Hello, please check your DMs!
@IlzeZeltina Labdien! Rati var būt arī divdaļīgi, tāpēc tie joprojām skaitīsies vieni rati!

@gigantosaurus14 Please check the validity period of your gift voucher in the PDF file you received. It is usually a year after it has been issued. As advised in our first reply, no further extensions are made at the moment. Thank you.

@TomGorse Hello! Total baggage allowance in such cases may also depend on the partner airline. When purchasing tickets on our webpage airbaltic,com for such route, checked baggage will be included: https://t.co/nsCqgxmhbk
@gigantosaurus14 Gift vouchers issued during the Covid-19 first waves (2020 and 2021) were already extended for all passengers, first till the end of 2020, then again in 2021.

@JeremyLeigh2 Hello, Jeremy.
Sorry to hear you feel this way, we apologize for that and inconvenience. Please be informed that this is due to seating restrictions and safety reasons.

@SolOnWheels Hello! May we kindly ask you to clarify (in DM message privately) the situation - do you see some error message every time when logging in and prompting to change the password? Screenshots of this would help us as well, thank you.

@RonJon80155026 @maxseddon @_austrian We will assist with your delayed baggage even when having 4 followers, Ron.

We hope your baggage is not delayed, though.

@maxseddon @_austrian Hello! We are saddened to hear about this unpleasant situation, our apologies.
May we kindly ask you to DM us more details privately about your full flight route you took as well as baggage irregularity reference number? We will check.
@BaibaTheBaiba Hello, Baiba. Our comment regarding this: https://t.co/etVS5xsn0z

@ErwinTijms @Schiphol Due to airport's staff shortage unfortunately we are not able to open check-in desks much earlier.
Please note that bags can be dropped only at the check-in desk.
@ErwinTijms Good morning! Our check-in desks are opened approximately 2 hours before flight departure time.
@SoyEvaBarbosa Hello! We are sorry to hear about this and apologise for inconveniences caused. We can see that you have messaged us privately as well, let us continue our coverage there. Thank you!
@hans_en Hello! Thank you for the message! We kindly ask you to message us privately with more details, we will check! 😊

urls.title: Baltic Outlook magazine | airBaltic
urls.description: Be they adventurous backpackers or sophisticated voyagers, the monthly Baltic Outlook magazine is an excellent resource for any kind of travellers.

data.text: August issue of Baltic Outlook is out! 🗺️ This month let Valencia, the city of joy, take you on an adventure of a lifetime! ☀️ Get inspired by this destination and more on board & online: https://t.co/zpjGjqlgpO https://t.co/c7MFSgxN0H

urls.title: Cancel your flight | airBaltic
urls.description: Get more information about: refund options depending on the ticket type you have purchased or are planning to purchase; our sickness warranty option; and travel insurance.

data.text: @ItsMingolino Hello! It may be possible, however depends on your purchased fare. Please check this link for more details and all the conditions: https://t.co/HQ1tsTHg7P
@PizarroVilla @Iberia Hello! May we kindly ask you to DM us more details privately with your exact flight route, as well as booking information? Thank you.
@KToTheFry Hello! May we kindly ask you to send us more details in DM message, about the reservation as well as where did you received such information? Thank you.

urls.title: airBaltic changes uniform rules, allows showing tattoos
urls.description: airBaltic announces that it has recently adjusted its uniform regulation, loosening rules for cabin crew, pilots and ground personnel

data.text: Here at airBaltic we always encourage our people to be themselves. Starting today, our cabin crew, pilots and ground personnel can show their tattoos, piercings and wear different hairstyles while performing their duties ✈️ https://t.co/1urSj7VIbo https://t.co/Bv1C95GSTp

@ievaals1 Labrīt! Vispirms, atvainojamies par šo situāciju. Darām visu iespējamo šajā vasaras sezonā, lai veiktu lidojumus pēc grafika, taču, lidostas darbinieku trūkums, diemžēl, var iespaidot lidojumu punktualitāti. Ja vēlaties, varam ieteikt vērsties lidostā sīkāku jautājumu sakarā.
@gigantosaurus14 Hello! Thanks for your question. As it is mentioned in the terms and conditions of Gift Voucher, it's validity period is non-extendable. Thank you.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text:
@HuDost Hello! We are very sorry to hear about this situation and apologize in advance. We kindly ask you to fill out this form, so that our colleagues can investigate this situation in detail: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An

Apologies once more!

@john_brown2022 @irts1 @_vvc Labdien! Informējam, ka reklāmas kādā konkrētā valodā (gan latviešu, gan, piemēram, lietuviešu, igauņu valodā utt.) dažādās interneta vietnēs var tikt rādītas balstoties uz konkrētā lietotāja "interneta rokrakstu", tostarp vēsturiski apmeklētajiem resursiem un mājaslapām.

@ingahoeglund Good morning! We checked with our team and were informed that unfortunately due to lack of airport staff only two of our desks are opened at the moment. We will see whether this can be improved from our representative side. Thanks for your patience in this situation.

@WendyMcKeown1 Hello, Wendy! Thanks for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear of such situation. May we kindly ask you to share your delayed baggage file reference number by writing us a direct message? We will check the status. Thank you.

urls.title: airBaltic Souvenir Collection - Shop

data.text:
@RenLovesBobMod Well, it can be purchased on our Souvenirs shop, take a look!
https://t.co/MKXY9cOOv6
@leo123v We are glad to hear that! Have a lovely evening! 😊

@NewtonEraVirgen Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us.
Our ticket conditions state that all flight segments must be flown in order, otherwise remaining ticket is cancelled. This means, your friend won't be able to enter the plane already in Riga if he/she will miss and won't fly the first flight.

@sjhorvath Hello once more, Stephen! We have just received information that our agents are not able to reach you by phone. We kindly invite you to contact us via +371 6700 6006 to receive assistance. Thank you.

@sjhorvath Hello, Stephen! Thanks for your messages. Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you are experiencing. We have contacted our colleagues and kindly inform you that our agents will get in touch with you shortly to provide further assistance. Thank you.
@rth1985 Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. May we kindly ask you to share your claim reference number by writing us a DM? We will check. Thank you.

urls.title: Izteikt pretenziju | Sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Gadījās kaut ko aizmirst lidmašīnā? Bagāžas piegāde kavējās? Piesaki pretenziju airBaltic par bagāžas pārvadāšanu, reisa izmaiņām un daudz ko citu internetā!

data.text:
@sembyleen Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Pirmkārt, atvainojamies par neērtībām, kas Jums radušās. Aicinām iesniegt oficiālu sūdzību mūsu mājas lapā: https://t.co/Y5ZBQN2LCT
Kolēģi no Klientu apkalpošanas nodaļas ar Jums sazināsies. Paldies.

urls.title: Choose your seat | Book Extra Seats | airBaltic
urls.description: Ensure a seat with a view and leg room! Choose a seat on board your next airBaltic flight online today. For additional comfort, book an extra seat.

data.text:
@ClioIonniB Hello! Thanks for your question. Please be informed that system always tries to allocate seats together for passengers within one reservation. However, to guarantee the exact seats, we kindly invite you to reserve them in advance: https://t.co/GDs5JViXW7
Thank you.

@pelnusniegi Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Pirmkārt, atvainojamies par neērtībām, kas Jums radušās aizkavētās bagāžas dēļ. Vai varam lūgt atsūtīt privātajā ziņā Jūsu aizkavētās bagāžas faila numuru? Pārbaudīsim! Paldies.
A moment when the worries slip away and the excitement of new adventures sets in! ✈️✨ https://t.co/SKQz0HqAbt

@TomsWanderlust @spaceulmen Labdien! Varam apliecināt, ka izvēlētās partneru lidmašīnas ir drošas un visiem standartiem atbilstošas. Pasažieru drošība vienmēr ir un būs mūsu top prioritāte. Atvainojamies par šo situāciju un tehniskajām problēmām.
@alisekitija 👀
@leo123v Hello! We have received your DM message and will provide an answer there, thank you.

urls.title: airBaltic begins redelivery of its Q400 fleet
urls.description: airBaltic announces that on July 20th it started the redelivery process of its Bombardier Q400 NextGen aircraft back to their lessor

data.text: We have started our last journey with Bombardier Q400 NextGen aircraft by redelivering them back to their lessor Nordic Aviation Capital ✈️ We thank the Bombardier fleet for being a part of our operations by connecting passengers all across our network: https://t.co/nAswv8e52s https://t.co/0ePQxLMIQJ

urls.description: airBaltic

data.text: For your next vacation, you deserve everything and more! 💚 Till Monday, choose our CLASSIC tickets with a 15€ discount per one-way or 30€ for a round trip. Enjoy such benefits as seat selection, flight date change and in general more flexibility: https://t.co/6UmW82Fp0b https://t.co/VpMUgnAs1z
@ayzz7 Hi! Apologies for the long waiting. Due to staff shortages around European airports, this task unfortunately in some cases can take muuuuch longer time than usual. Apologies for that!

data.text: Greetings from @FIAFarnborough! Once again, we have partnered with @Airbus to showcase its A220-300 aircraft. #FIA2022 is one of the largest airshows in the world, connecting aerospace professionals across all areas of the industry to enable business growth and recovery. https://t.co/XdEOcEK1iq

urls.title: Aizkavējusies, nozaudēta vai bojāta bagāža | Bagāžas noteikumi | airBaltic
urls.description: Tava bagāža ir aizkavējusies, nozaudēta vai bojāta? Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām. Lūdzam savlaicīgi ziņot par to airBaltic un aizpildīt iesniegumu!

data.text:
@Sneideriene Labvakar! Atvainojamies par šo nepatīkamo situāciju saistībā ar bagāžas aizkavēšanos.
Lūdzam skatīt šo saiti par sīkākām detaļām un nākamajiem soļiem šajā situācijā: https://t.co/xFcI5d8LaF
@aortalastenoze Labrīt! Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām. https://t.co/l2wxkxDiG6
@Guerardoe Hello, Robin. Please DM us privately more details (such as your booking reference number), we will check!

@Sharif152 Hello! Sorry to hear about such unpleasant situation with your baggage, our apologies.
May we kindly ask you to DM us privately more details such as baggage irregularity reference number as well as passenger names/surnames?

@notdiin Thanks. We advise you to contact your travel agency in this case as we guess that flights are not connected (no such agreement with Wizzair) therefore would mean you would need to purchase a new ticket with us if the flight is missed. However your agency should advise on this.

@notdiin Hello! Sorry to hear about such unpleasant situation, our apologies.
May we ask you to clarify - were both of your flights in the itinerary connected? If so, was the first flight (which is delayed) performed by different airline?

data.text:
@ZaneGruznina @PTACgovLV Hello and our apologies for this unpleasant situation once again.
We invite you to click also on flight performed by United Airlines in the form (so all the flights for the outbound journey are there). If still experiencing technical issues with form later today, please DM us.

data.text: airBaltic’s thirteenth #NFT collection is live! 🔔 The new edition of the City Collection features Jūrmala city #cryptoart and can now be purchased by #NFTCommmunity on @opensea marketplace for a fixed price of 0.1 Ether: https://t.co/KFx02PqGwL https://t.co/YcJdtMkQXj

@esesmustirna @RitaEvaNa @john_brown2022 @zvejniekameita airBaltic ir bāze ne tikai Rīgas, bet arī Viļņas 🇱🇹, Tallinas 🇪🇪 un Tamperes 🇫🇮 lidostās. Katrai vakancei un bāzei, protams, var būt savas prasības.
@esesmustirna @RitaEvaNa @john_brown2022 @zvejniekameita https://t.co/TEssCjl9Ut
@Janreis6 @Gaussm Our apologies for the inconveniences, Jānis. Our comment regarding this situation: https://t.co/6gNRUs4Ioj

data.text: If you wish to travel in full comfort, we have something to make it come true - meet BUSINESS light! 🎩✈️ With this new ticket type, travelling with class has become more affordable, than ever! The list of perks is worthwhile, see them here and book away: https://t.co/nyjKF5h2J1 https://t.co/wy113OcNrf
